description:
Learn to speak in Malayalam via phrasebook, tutorials. Fast, easy and fun way to learn Malayalam.

App is continuously updated based on your feedback.Your 100% satisfaction is guaranteed.

App Tools include search.

Designed for English Speakers. Tap a phrase and it will be spoken for you in Malayalam. Anytime, Anywhere.

Meeting friends and co-workers from India could be much more fun with this app.

Focus is on every day phrases and words and app is categorized by following topics:



Includes following tutorials:

 Tips for effective language learning,

 Numbers and Measures,

 Vocabulary.


Includes following PhraseBooks:

 Greetings and General Words,

 Phrases for Courtesy,
 
 Food, Drink, and Going Out,

 Places, People, and Family,

 Travelling Around,

 General Questions,

 Police Emergency,

 Medical and Disaster Emergency,

 Shopping.

What is unique about RealSimpleEDU apps? 


 1) A touch friendly, quick reference app, which is always in your pocket and  always works (no data connection required)
 
 2) A companion app for on-the-go, bite-sized learning 

 3) Offers value for money (A lifetime of free updates) 

 4) 225,000 paying customers from 153 Countries

Our Vision: Provide on-the-go references that enable our customers to refer, learn and remember; easy to learn, more engaging and most complete.

Our Mission: A RealSimpleEDU app in every pocket.

Please write to us. We would love to improve this app.
